news.title: Chris Mason: Trump visit puts focus on pageantry after PM's tough fortnight
news.summary: The government will hope for a reprieve from questions about Peter Mandelson, says the BBC's political editor.

news.title: Charlie Kirk suspect confessed in hidden note to roommate, prosecutors allege
news.summary: The 22-year-old has been charged with murder and is facing the death penalty if convicted at trial.

news.title: Fake medicine almost killed my cat - here's how to keep your pet safe
news.summary: Pet owners are being urged to check all medicines carefully before using them.

news.title: Labour deputy hopeful Powell attacks welfare 'errors'
news.summary: Lucy Powell also hits back at claims she is running to be deputy leader as a "proxy" for Andy Burnham.

news.title: New AI deal could rapidly boost UK economy, says Microsoft boss
news.summary: Boss Satya Nadella said it was the biggest investment the firm had made outside of the US.

news.title: The Papers: 'The ego has landed' and 'Don in... none out'
news.summary: Donald Trump's arrival in the UK and the blocked removal of a migrant to France lead the papers.

news.title: Watch: Key takeaways from Charlie Kirk suspect's first court appearance
news.summary: The BBC's Nada Tawfik reports from Utah, where Tyler Robinson appeared in court as prosecutors read the charges against him.

news.title: 'I created a successful business thanks to a disability grant - but cuts will sink it'
news.summary: Many disabled workers face the threat of losing their jobs or businesses because of long waits for government grants.

news.title: Syria's worst drought in decades pushes millions to the brink
news.summary: The drought has slashed wheat harvests by 40% in a country where nearly 90% of the population already lives in poverty.

news.title: 'It took 20 years but I brought my rapist to justice'
news.summary: Dan Cooper describes how serving on a jury prompted him to re-report the attack he suffered in 2004.
